subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James opened the scoring with a soaring dunk that augured how easily he and his teammates, including the former Knicks J. R. Smith and Iman Shumpert, would create and finish.
snippet: LeBron James opened the scoring with a soaring dunk that augured how easily he and his teammates, including the former Knicks J. R. Smith and Iman Shumpert, would create and finish.
